snippet: Twitter is courting Christian evangelical leaders, who have found the network to be surprisingly effective for building influence and spreading inspiration far and wide.
abstract: Twitter is courting Christian evangelical leaders, who have found the network to be surprisingly effective for building influence and spreading inspiration; messages from prominent evangelical tweeters tend to be re-posted at faster rates than those from pop culture and political figures who have a larger number of followers.
lead_paragraph: Twitter is courting Christian evangelical leaders, who have found the network to be surprisingly effective for building influence and spreading inspiration far and wide.

headline.seo: Christian Leaders Are Powerhouses on Twitter
headline.main: Christian Leaders Are Powerhouses on Twitter
headline.print_headline: Twitter Dynamos, Offering Word of God’s Love
